name: LinkedIn Desktop POC
description: Visual-only LinkedIn sourcing flow using an existing Firefox session.
requirements:
Use the already-open Firefox window that is signed in to LinkedIn on the desktop. Do not launch a new browser or open new tabs. Steps:
1) Bring the Firefox window with LinkedIn into focus and maximize it if needed.
2) Search for candidate A and send a connection request with a short note.
3) Search for candidate B (an existing connection) and send a brief message.
4) Open candidate B's profile and generate a short sourcer-style summary of their experience.
Operate entirely via desktop screenshots and absolute coordinates (no DOM). Prefer cached coordinates when available.
expected_outcomes: Firefox/LinkedIn window is frontmost and ready for interaction
Candidate A search completes and a connect invite is sent with a note
Candidate B search completes and an in-network message is sent
Candidate B profile is opened and summarized in the final output
notes: Ensure /dev/uinput is available and ffmpeg/xrandr are installed. Keep resolution at 1920x1080 if possible for cache stability.
